TopicTitle: Refill Button for landed at KSP crafts.

Articles.Content:
Pretty sure this is already considert but we sure will need a refill button (and of curse charge us for it) for landed/stationary crafts at KSP at least in Mission Control.

Maybe a Possiblity to Transfer Crew, too.

Otherwise SSTO's would require us to "Spawn" the tanks to refill it and pay extra.
